description: The procedure of combined facial cleansing is considered one of the most popular procedures. Combines two types of cleaning - mechanical and ultrasonic. During mechanical cleaning, deep pores are cleaned, comedones, sebaceous plugs, blackheads are removed. The procedure ends with ultrasound to exfoliate epidermis, smooth the surface of the skin and normalize the functioning of the sebaceous glands. Both methods perfectly complement each other, allowing you to cleanse the skin with maximum effect .
